TopicTitle: The Official Kerbin Cup Tournament Thread - Final Entries Posted

Articles.Content:
How will we know that those heathens at reddit aren't secretly voting in a block for their entries?
. . . but if we find the reddit entries, (or forum entries for that matter) get vastly more votes, that could be a sign that something is up.

Reddit vs. Forum doesn't even have an effect on the competition right now. A team from each side will be eliminated until there are only two teams left.

That said, I amicably agree that all participants (and even non-participants) should refrain from attempts to identify the team associated with the entries until voting is complete.

Edited June 21, 2014 by chicknblender
Ah, I didn't realize the teams were bracketed by community, that does change things a bit in that it should reduce political voting.

As is any other mod you can think of.

Yet another way for Squad to screw over Stock Players in challenges.

Yet another way for Squad to screw over Stock Players in challenges.

ThatÃ‚Â´s why teams are comprised of players with different skillsets each, I have never installed a mod, but we have an experienced modder on our ranks.

Yet another way for Squad to screw over Stock Players in challenges.

Don't like mods? Vote for stock craft.

ThatÃ‚Â´s why teams are comprised of players with different skillsets each, I have never installed a mod, but we have an experienced modder on our ranks.

Wooks beat me to it. Our team has two mod-fiends and two stock-rockers and we're all having fun and contributing.
If there's no pics soon
Mmmm'kay?

hahahah. I just picture the mods sitting around laughing at making us wait, and I always appreciate a good ol fashion mob.

Or maybe the sheer level of craftsmanship caused all their minds to implode, in which case we have lots of blood on our hands

Edited June 21, 2014 by clown_baby
Yet another way for Squad to screw over Stock Players in challenges.
Totally not waiting, playing it cool
^ indeed Wooks xD I will not be here for voting (going to the Oregon coast!), but I expect greatness.
The suspense is killing me. My F5 key only suffers this much when a new KSP release is about to drop.

Patience Padawans. Go launch some insanities.

Or read fanworks!

(Here's some to get you started )

It will get here.

 

I'm going to conclude all my posts in this thread with this.

Also, looking back on all the photos of our teams trophy.... arg, hope we picked the right one!

Edited August 7, 2018 by Tw1
nostalgia

Sorry you feel that way, Fleet Master, but that's not the intention. It's one of the few reasons why teams should be balanced in different styles. Besides, there are a few other challenges that will be happening. This is just one

Now as for the lot of ya, I'm waiting for a piece of info concerning polling access so the whole shebang is likely to go up at one time tomorrow.

Crazy thought here. Would it have been a better idea to work out the technical details of the poll *before* the submission deadline?
IÃ‚Â´m not saying that we are waiting for the Kerbal Cup, but...

I just woke up. It's like Santa skipped my house.

Also I think we all agree not to reveal which craft is ours til votings over right?

Edited June 21, 2014 by clown_baby

Also I think we all agree not to reveal which craft is ours til votings over right?

We can't reveal it, if you do, you would be disqualified!, so take extra care!

Well this was discussed before. This rule

4. You must not talk about your work or reveal your work to the community until we unveil it and make it open for votes.

makes it sound like as soon as the voting started it was fair game. But just like you m1, everyone assumes it's after the voting stops. So I say we just all stick to that idea.

Maybe when the poll and pics are dropped there could be a disclaimer above it asking all the teams to hold off until the voting closes?

This rule
4. You must not talk about your work or reveal your work to the community until we unveil it and make it open for votes

makes it sound like as soon as the voting started it was fair game. But just like you m1, everyone assumes it's after the voting stops. So I say we just all stick to that idea.

It wasn't perfectly clear, as you pointed out. But we got some clarification:

I was under the impression that the images would not be identifiable, to give everyone a fair go- the image must be judged on its merit, not the team's own hype. Plus, if all the images, including the reddit ones are going to be here, if theirs are identifiable, they will also be judged with bias.

Yes, that's correct.

I asked Rowsdower myself on IRC the last day, I'm gonna copy the question as I think it won't matter to him and it's good for every team to know!:

- - - Updated - - -

m1sz rowsdower!, hi, I have a quick question about the kerbin cup

[20:25] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:26] Rowsdower_ sure

[20:26] m1sz Aside from the cup, we've been working on a promotional video for our creation, with a lot of effort from one of our members (Wooks)

[20:26] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:26] m1sz team I Think We Broke It

[20:26] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:26] Rowsdower_ ok

[20:26] m1sz I've just read what you wrote on the forum, thread

[20:26] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:27] m1sz that the voting will happen without anyone knowing who made the entry

[20:27] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:27] Rowsdower_ yes

[20:27] m1sz so we wont be able to release the video until the voting is done, right?

[20:27] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:27] Rowsdower_ correct

[20:27] m1sz no advertising for us this time then =)

[20:27] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:27] m1sz thanks a lot!

[20:27] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy

[20:27] Rowsdower_ heh alright

[20:27] Rowsdower_ np

[20:28] m1sz bye

[20:28] == Rowsdower_ is away: I'm busy
Dude, leave him alone, he's busy!
SOME GHOST TEXT THING GOING ON MAN, THIS IS AMAZING

Entries are up! Voting is up! Check out the OP for the linkage.

Oh and Red Iron Crown, it's cool. I was happy to help
